name: Idiopathic Tracheobronchial Amyloidosis
chief_complaint: I can't breathe properly and I keep wheezing
physical_findings: reduced air entry in lower lobes
prognosis: Variable; progressive disease may lead to respiratory failure without intervention
description: A rare form of localized amyloidosis characterized by abnormal protein deposition in tracheobronchial walls, causing progressive airway obstruction. Often misdiagnosed as asthma or COPD initially.
